channel.title: whonix.org apt repository - testers wanted!
channel.description:
Originally published at: https://www.whonix.org/blog/test-whonix-org-apt-repository
Now hosted on whonix.org rather than volunteer mirror network. Should be more reliable. This is what we will be using in Whonix 13. sudo whonix_repository --baseuri http://whonix.org/download/whonixdevelopermetafiles/internal/ --repository stable --enable Feel free to experiment with TLS. sudo whonix_repository --baseuri https://whonix.org/download/whonixdevelopermetafiles/internal/ --repository stable --enable Although TLS is not worth that much at the moment because the Debian (and Tor Project) repository is not available over TLS. Whonix APT Repository documentation: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix-APT-Repository Development tickets... move to whonix.org repository https://phabricator.whonix.org/T475 Switch Debian links in sources.list to .onion https://phabricator.whonix.org/T399

item.title: whonix.org apt repository - testers wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Originally published at: https://www.whonix.org/blog/test-whonix-org-apt-repository
Now hosted on whonix.org rather than volunteer mirror network. Should be more reliable.

This is what we will be using in Whonix 13.

sudo whonix_repository --baseuri http://whonix.org/download/whonixdevelopermetafiles/internal/ --repository stable --enable

Feel free to experiment with TLS.

sudo whonix_repository --baseuri https://whonix.org/download/whonixdevelopermetafiles/internal/ --repository stable --enable

Although TLS is not worth that much at the moment because the Debian (and Tor Project) repository is not available over TLS.

Whonix APT Repository documentation:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix-APT-Repository

Development ticketsâ€¦

move to whonix.org repository
https://phabricator.whonix.org/T475

Switch Debian links in sources.list to .onion
https://phabricator.whonix.org/T399

Read full topic
